name: Warlord of the Realm
description:
The PUNY humans think they can use their sheer number to wage war against us - the WARLORDS OF THE REALM! I will CRUSH them with my FISTS and MY HEAD!

Controls:
A, D move left or right
Space to SMASH!
Shift to Charge Energy for more SMASH!

Game developed by:
Alcedine
Akusan
